nodes.text: Lord Bolleon was a male individual who was a member of the family House Bolleon. Bolleon was a collector of artifacts and primitive art, and at some point during galactic history he journeyed to the planet of Durace with the protocol droid GB-3P0, to translate the world's ancient pictographs. However, something on Durace did not want the writings to be deciphered and it killed Bolleon before he could complete his translation.
